title: New skin idea- Soul Reaver Fiora
body:
I think that a soul reaver fiora would be a really cool skin.
http://kumikopixiv.deviantart.com/art/Soul-reaper-Fiora-345232755

replies.body:
**"Your destiny is irresistible, Fiora – you are my soul reaver, the scourge of the yordles, reaper of their apostate souls."**

10/10 would buy

*let Duelist stack on large monsters too for Fiora jungle* :3

That is a pretty cool skin concept. I love that it is in essence still Fiora. It has her profile, you'd recognize that it is her in game... Basically all the requirements you need for a skin. I could see this being in game.
(Cries) So beautiful....
YES YES and  YES make this a thing Riot. Right know she has 3 skins and 1 is unavailable. I would buy this skin.
it looks so cool i hope riot makes it nice fiora skin {{champion:114}} approved
I would buy this while clicking so hard and fast that the RP store would register me buying it twice... and I wouldn't even be mad.
She need a new skin.
Someone who really needs a new skin is Zed. His Shockblade skin is old.
He got SKT T1 Zed not too long ago
OMG if only T.T
I WANT!!!!
Rito plz make this take my money
Still waiting for the fiora rework :(
I would purchase Fiora just for this skin!
Please, Riot
Would buy, if I liked Fiora
I hear she's getting a rework (don't quote me, that's second hand knowledge). Even though you're missing out now, maybe you'll like her later.
Riot, plz. This and Soul Reaver Talon would be insta buys for me.

Instabuy.
Lingering blue after-traces after using q or while using ult would be awesome.
Absolustely fantastic.
